scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a short undated autograph letter from Julien Green, Rue De Varenne, to "Cher ami," assuring his friend that he is always happy to hear from him and suggesting that he call between 10:00 and 12:00 to speak with him. Also present is a clipping of an article, "Julian [sic] Green, Francophile" by Bernard Fay in The Saturday Review of Literature,June 18, 1927.
